content:
Today I chose PR #30354 for discussion!

feat(Combinatorics/SimpleGraph/Connectivity/WalkCounting): a spanning subgraph has the same or more connected components

Is this PR still relevant? Any recent updates? Anyone making progress?

Yay I won the raffle :tada: Weird that it failed to tag me
This PR is still relevant, just patiently waiting to be reviewed
